title: If You Shop One Amazon Prime Deal Today, Make It Crest Whitestrips
description: .disclaimer{width:90%;margin-bottom:1rem}.disclaimer__lines{width:100%;margin:0 auto;border-bottom:1px solid #999;padding:0;max-width:150px}.disclaimer__copy{width:100%;max-width:355px;font-family:Brown Regular,sans-serif;font-size:.9rem;font-weight:300;line-height:1.3em;color:#333;padding:0 0 .4rem;margin:1rem auto;text-align:center} All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission. Super Sale Alert: Products in this story may be marked down for Prime Big Deals Day. Shop our full coverage of the event here — or, dive directly into the deals here. Crest Whitestrips are the unofficial (but nevertheless uncontested) star deal of Prime Days past — and for good reason. The highly rated teeth-whitening system rarely gets more than a paltry discount; however, Prime Big Deal Days is the rare occasion when Crest Whitestrips reliably go for $30 — a serious steal if you ask us. And now that October’s Prime Big Deal Days are finally here, Crest Whitestrips are (spoiler alert) part of the drill. In addition to various Whitestrips kit options, you can save big on other oral care essentials like toothpaste, electric toothbrushes, floss, and more. Perhaps the most widely-carted item from the bunch is Crest’s 3D Whitestrips Professional Effects, marked down to $29.99 from $45.99, which boasts over 89,000 reviews as of press time. Another popular choice is the Crest 3D Whitestrips Radiant Express which one reviewer has dubbed “as you can get without going to a dentist.” And speaking of, if you want to more closely mimic the professional teeth-whitening experience you’d get at the dentist, there is the Crest 3D Whitestrips with Light Whitening Kit, to help achieve your brightest pearly whites ever by enhancing the effects of the brightening gel via LED light.  Ahead, peruse every Crest Whitestrips kit on sale for Prime Big Deal Days and shop the smile-worthy deals below. DashDividers_1_500x100 Crest 3D Whitestrips Professional Effects, $45.99 $29.99 Crest 3D Whitestrips with Light, Teeth Whitening Strip Kit, $69.99 $39.99 Crest 3D Whitestrips, Radiant Express with LED Accelerator Light, $79.99 $59.99 Out of the thousands of deals available, trust us: You won’t regret adding a box (or, heck, two) to your Prime Big Deal Days haul. Like what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?37 Excellent Amazon Prime Beauty Deals To ShopLast Chance: Score These Prime Day Fashion DealsHere's What R29 Editors Are Shopping For Prime Day
author: Karina Hoshikawa
excerpt: Crest Whitestrips are up to 43% off for Amazon's Prime Big Deal Days 2024 — shop the deal here.

html:
All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.

Photo: Courtesy of Amazon.

Crest Whitestrips are the unofficial (but nevertheless uncontested) star deal of Prime Days past — and for good reason. The highly rated teeth-whitening system rarely gets more than a paltry discount; however, Prime Big Deal Days is the rare occasion when Crest Whitestrips reliably go for $30 — a serious steal if you ask us.

And now that October's Prime Big Deal Days are finally here, Crest Whitestrips are (spoiler alert) part of the drill. In addition to various Whitestrips kit options, you can save big on other oral care essentials like toothpaste, electric toothbrushes, floss, and more.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

Perhaps the most widely-carted item from the bunch is Crest’s 3D Whitestrips Professional Effects, marked down to $29.99 from $45.99, which boasts over 89,000 reviews as of press time. Another popular choice is the Crest 3D Whitestrips Radiant Express which one reviewer has dubbed "as you can get without going to a dentist." And speaking of, if you want to more closely mimic the professional teeth-whitening experience you’d get at the dentist, there is the Crest 3D Whitestrips with Light Whitening Kit, to help achieve your brightest pearly whites ever by enhancing the effects of the brightening gel via LED light.  Ahead, peruse every Crest Whitestrips kit on sale for Prime Big Deal Days and shop the smile-worthy deals below.

Out of the thousands of deals available, trust us: You won't regret adding a box (or, heck, two) to your Prime Big Deal Days haul.
